mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "There's a Rainbow 'Round Your Shoulder", "Bye Bye Blues", and "Square Acres Mixer" ROUND DANCES "Humoresque Two-Step" and "Meet the People" SPECIAL FEATURES "Picture of the Month", "Recording Dances", "On the Record; Report from Record Companies", "First Winter Asilomar", "An Approach to Patter Calling", "Heart Warmers", "Maple-Leaf Mike-Men", and "San Diego Convention Travel tips". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Style Series; 'The Daisy Chain'", "The Square Dance Picture", "Caller of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
